research_content:
# Midwest State Veterans Affairs Offices Directory

## Illinois

**State Department Name:** Illinois Department of Veterans Affairs

**Main Office Address:** 833 South Spring Street, Springfield, IL 62704

**Phone:** 217-782-6641 | Toll-Free: 1-800-437-9824

**Website:** [veterans.illinois.gov](https://veterans.illinois.gov/)

**Office Hours:** Monday - Friday, 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

**Additional Location:** Chicago Office (George Dunne County Building, 69 West Washington, Suite 1620, Chicago, IL 60602) | 312-814-2460

---

## Ohio

**State Department Name:** Ohio Department of Veterans Affairs

**Main Office Address:** 77 South High Street, 7th Floor, Columbus, OH 43215

**Phone:** (614) 644-0898

**Email:** ohiovet@dvs.ohio.gov

**Website:** [dvs.ohio.gov](https://dvs.ohio.gov)

---

## Michigan

**State Department Name:** Michigan Veterans Affairs Agency (MVAA)

**Main Office Address:** 3423 N. Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd., Building 32, Lansing, MI 48906

**Phone:** 800-MICH-VET (800-642-4838)

**Website:** [michigan.gov/mvaa](https://www.michigan.gov/mvaa)

**Office Hours:** Monday–Friday, 8 a.m.–5 p.m. (24/7 support available through 211 agents after hours)

---

## Indiana

**State Department Name:** Indiana Department of Veterans Affairs (IDVA)

**Main Office Address:** 777 North Meridian Street, Suite 300, Indianapolis, IN 46204

**Phone:** 317-232-3910 | Toll-Free (In State): 1-800-400-4520

**Fax:** 317-232-7721

**Website:** [www.in.gov/dva/](https://www.in.gov/dva/)

---

## Wisconsin

**State Department Name:** Wisconsin Department of Veterans Affairs

**Main Office Address:** 2135 Rimrock Road, PO Box 7843, Madison, WI 53707-7843

**Phone:** 608-267-0517

**Website:** [dva.wi.gov](https://dva.wi.gov)

**Office Hours:** Monday – Friday, 7:45 a.m. – 4:15 p.m.

---

## Minnesota

**State Department Name:** Minnesota Department of Veterans Affairs

**Main Office Address:** 20 West 12th Street, Room 206, St. Paul, MN 55155

**Phone:** (888) 546-5838

**Website:** [mn.gov/mdva](https://mn.gov/mdva/)

---

## Iowa

**State Department Name:** Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs

**Main Office Address:** 210 Walnut Street, Des Moines, IA 50309

**Phone:** (515) 323-7464 | Alternate: (515) 252-4698 | Toll-Free: (800) 838-4692

**Website:** [dva.iowa.gov](https://dva.iowa.gov/)

---

## Missouri

**State Department Name:** Missouri Veterans Commission

**Main Office Address:** 3401 Knipp Drive, Jefferson City, MO 65109

**Phone:** 314-421-8676 / 314-421-8673

**Website:** [mvc.dps.mo.gov](https://mvc.dps.mo.gov/)

**Office Hours:** Monday-Friday, 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.

---

## Kansas

**State Department Name:** Kansas Office of Veterans Services (KOVS)

**Main Office Address:** Jayhawk Tower, 700 S.W. Jackson Street, Suite 1004, Topeka, KS 66603-3743

**Phone:** (785) 296-3976 | Toll-Free: (800) 513-7731

**Fax:** (785) 296-1462

**Website:** [kovs.ks.gov](https://www.kovs.ks.gov/)

---

## Nebraska

**State Department Name:** Nebraska Department of Veterans' Affairs (NDVA)

**Main Office Address:** 3800 Village Drive, Lincoln, NE 68516-4737

**Phone:** (402) 420-4021

**Email:** ndva.sso@nebraska.gov

**Website:** [veterans.nebraska.gov](https://veterans.nebraska.gov/)

**Office Hours:** Monday-Friday, 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. CST

---

## Sources

- [Illinois Department of Veterans Affairs](https://veterans.illinois.gov/)
- [Ohio Department of Veterans Affairs](https://dvs.ohio.gov)
- [Michigan Veterans Affairs Agency](https://www.michigan.gov/mvaa)
- [Indiana Department of Veterans Affairs](https://www.in.gov/dva/)
- [Wisconsin Department of Veterans Affairs](https://dva.wi.gov)
- [Minnesota Department of Veterans Affairs](https://mn.gov/mdva/)
- [Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs](https://dva.iowa.gov/)
- [Missouri Veterans Commission](https://mvc.dps.mo.gov/)
- [Kansas Office of Veterans Services](https://www.kovs.ks.gov/)
- [Nebraska Department of Veterans' Affairs](https://veterans.nebraska.gov/)
